text: [I'M HAPPY] Yes, of course.
[I'M HAPPY] A long time ago... [I'M HAPPY] Krev and I were Companions. [I'M HAPPY] We were almost like twin brothers, we were inseparable in the battles.
[I'M ANGRY] But one day... [I'M ANGRY] We both were invited to ascend to the circle.
[I'M HAPPY] Fortunately, Krev noticed what the circle was about, and we fled before being forced to drink the cursed wolf's blood.
[I'M HAPPY] We fled from Whiterun, and sometime later we discovered about the Silver Hands.
[I'M SAD] They didn't know but when Krev was a little kid, his mother was murdered by a werewolf...
[I'M HAPPY] Since then, we have been fighting for the Silver Hand.
[I'M HAPPY] We have been hiring valiant warriors who hate werewolves and Daedra more than anything.
It happened many years ago when I was still a young Orc.
Before living here at Gallows Rock I used to live in an Orc stronghold in Hammerfell, close to Falkreath.
It was there where I learned about smiting and forging.
We Orcs have been forging iron, steel, and orichalcum for millennia.
But our stronghold was above a Silver Mine.  And some few miles away there was an ancient Dwammer ruin.
[I'M HAPPY] As you can imagine, I had the opportunity to experiment a lot with these materials before coming here.
[I'M SAD] One day I decided to challenge the stronghold leadership, and lost the fight.
I was lucky to escape alive.  I was afraid, and hide in a cave.
[I'M SCARED] I thought it was a safe place, but I was wrong. [I'M SCARED] A wild werewolf appeared and came after me.
[I'M SAD] I was injured and could not fight. [I'M SAD] I thought that was the end for me.
[I'M HAPPY] But suddenly Krev and Fjol appeared and killed the beast.
[I'M HAPPY] My life had gained a new purpose. [I'M HAPPY] I Joined the Silver Hands and I'm helping with the forge since then.
That's a long story...  I was a member of a hunter's guild in Valenwood some years ago.
[I'M HAPPY] But I always wanted to travel to the other provinces in Tamriel. [I'M HAPPY] To explore the world...
[I'M PUZZLED] In my researches, I discovered about some werewolf hunters here in Skyrim. [I'M PUZZLED] But I couldn't find any clear information about where they reside.
[I'M PUZZLED] I went to Whiterun, to seek information. [I'M PUZZLED] But some people started to act strangely towards me.
[I'M ANGRY] In the next day a strong guy punched me in the face, and summoned me to leave the city in twenty-four hours if I wanted to stay alive.
[I'M SAD] I tried to talk with the guards, but it was useless.
In the same day I was heading back to Vallenwod.
[I'M HAPPY] But, when I was outside the city, a farmer came toward me and told me where I should go to meet the Werewolf Hunters.
[I'M HAPPY] I joined and I'm here since then. [I'M HAPPY] Later I discovered that the farmer was Irrokas, our spy.
But, when I was outside the city, a farmer came toward me and told me where I should go to meet the Werewolf Hunters.
[I'M HAPPY] Well, it happened some years ago after I fled from Cyrodil.
[I'M SAD] I was a prisoner in Bruma... [I'M SAD] I had some problems with the guards in the city.
I managed to escape and fled to Skyrim...
[I'M SAD] When I finished the Pale Pass' crossing and arrived in Skyrim, I was freezing to death and starving...
[I'M HAPPY] Then, a Silver Hand group led by Krev found me. [I'M HAPPY] They gave me food and shelter.
[I'M HAPPY] They received me as a brother. [I'M HAPPY] No one outside Elsweyr had ever treated me like this before.
[I'M HAPPY] I'm here since then.
Very well!
[I'M HAPPY] All right.
[I'M HAPPY] I'll make the arrangements. [I'M HAPPY] The next time you go to your quarter, your new furnishings will be in place.
[I'M HAPPY] I'll be glad to help you improve your quarters, if you have the coin.
Now, what things you would like me to purchase?
Ow...  let me see...
I see...  So what Vignar said was true...  Kodlack was trying to find a cure...
So...  the witches responsible for the curse are on Glenmoril Coven...
He believed that he could achieve the cure by burning a Witch's head in the Flame of the Harbinger...
Since he has regret at the end of his life, the least we should do is try to save his soul in this way.
We shall do that in honor of Ysgramor.
Perfect!  I need 20 vessels of Dwrammer oil, 20 pots of fire salts, 10 pots of void salts, and 20 ingots of quicksilver.
Ok.  Come back if you change your mind.
Ah, yes...  Fjol discovered this method in some ancient books he found in a lost ruin.
We worked hard on mastering the method.  After many tries, we could reconstruct this ancient recipe.
Unfortunately, we are running out of the materials required.
Let's make a deal: you go search for the materials, I will teach you everything I know about silver forgering.
[I'M SURPRISED] Yes, I'm. [I'M SURPRISED] I believe you are the new recruit, right? [I'M SURPRISED] I heard a lot about you.
Good look out there.  May Ysgramor guide your path.
Good look out there.  May Ysgramor guide your path.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] The Companions in Whiterun...
Go to Cold Rock Pass and kill the Frost Troll living there.  The bigger one.  Come back with a proof of your hunt.  Then we may talk again.
If  you are unable to kill that frost troll, you will be unable to kill werewolves anyway.
[I'M ANGRY] So get you of here before I kill you.
[I'M ANGRY] So get you of here before I kill you.
So get you of here before I kill you.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] That's because we have powerful enemies out there...
That is not a simple question.  As I said, our group eighter hunts and is persecuted by powerful enemies.
First we have to know if you are trustful and worth joining us.  Therefore, you must complete an initiation task.
We are the Silver Hand.  We are werewolf hunters.
[I'M ANGRY] So get out of here!
Stop right there.  What do you want?
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] I can sense the presence of evil daedra here in this city. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] Go to Gallows Rock if you want to know the truth.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] I can smell a dirty wolf's stink in this city... [THIS IS DISGUSTING] My senses do not fool me. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] There is daedric influence nearby.
Now, you are officially a silver hand initiate.  Take this armor and shield.
They are not expensive ones, but are especially good to protect against the cold weather of the ice fields.
Take this weapon!  It is a Silver sword.  It will protect you against the foul creatures we fight.
I will give you this book too, it is called Songs of Return, volume seven.
Read it!  You will learn more about the Ysgramor and its legacy.
Each Silver Hand must read one of this.
Downstairs, there is a library, where you will find others useful books, if you are interested.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] We fight against these beasts to cleanse this foul daedric disease that has taken the sanity of many of our brothers and sisters here on Skyrim.
[I'M ANGRY] But worst, this curse corrupted the souls of many sons of Skyrim, taking them away from Sovngarde in exchange of an ephemeral power in life.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] But you must be aware. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] No only beggars and forgotten people have lycanthropy here on Skyrim.
[I'M ANGRY] Many influential and powerful people have this curse... [I'M ANGRY] or 'gift' as they say...
If you become a Silver Hand, you will have to fight against strong people, but also politically powerful  as well.
[I'M PUZZLED] After all I said, do you still want to become a Silver Hand?
This is an honor cause that every sons and daughters of Skyrim who wish to go Sovngarde one day, must fight for.
But I have more things to say before you can join us.
An adventure seeker eh?  We need more people like you here.
But I have more things to say before you can join us.
[I'M HAPPY] Yes I'm! [I'M HAPPY] Welcome! [I'M HAPPY] You did well against the frost troll on the Cold Rock Pass. [I'M HAPPY] Congratulations! [I'M HAPPY] You proceed well on our initiation.
But, before we proceed, I have a question.  Why do you want to join the Silver Hands?

[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] I knew you would succedded. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Go talk to 'Krev the Skinner', our leader. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] He is in the main Hall. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] He is waiting for you. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Good Luck!
It is not an easy task.  But if you want to know if you are worth, go to Gallows Rock.
I'm a Silver Hand.  We are werewolf hunters.
[I'M ANGRY] So get out of here!
[I'M ANGRY] Stop right there. [I'M ANGRY] What do you want?
[I'M HAPPY] We did it! [I'M HAPPY] You found the fragment! [I'M HAPPY] Let's not waste any time. [I'M HAPPY] We must return to Gallows Rock and bring it to Krev.
The Wuuthrad axe is a legendary weapon owned by the great Nord hero, Ysgramor, the spiritual leader of our group.
The story tells it was forged by his son, Yngol, a day after the Night of Tears.
He used the tears of grief from his father, made of pure ebony.
But it was broken into dozens of pieces, many centuries ago.
The fragments were spread all across Tamriel.  We, the Silver Hands, have been looking for the fragments since our foundation.
I received a letter this morning from Fjol, the leader of the Driftshade Refugee camp.  He is the second after my command.
His research led him to conclude that a possible location of one of the remaining fragments is an old Nordic ruin on the Rift.
Talk to Hillara.  She will accompany you on this adventure.
[I'M HAPPY] I have the first task for you. [I'M HAPPY] Have you heard about the Wuuthrad axe?
[I'M HAPPY] Lead the way.
[I'M SURPRISED] Aw yes. [I'M SURPRISED] Krev told me about the clues Fjol was able to find.
[I'M HAPPY] He believes that one of the missing fragments of Ysgramor's axe is part of the Angarvunde treasure trove.
[I'M HAPPY] I'll mark the location of the tomb on your map. [I'M HAPPY] It is located between Riften and Ivarstead.
By Ysgramor!  You did it.  You found the fragment!  Fjol was right once again.  Congratulations.  You are doing very well brother.
You should meet Fjol.  He will have other tasks for you.
[I'M HAPPY] Good! [I'M HAPPY] Before we continue, I need to thank you for your efforts so far.
Take this sword as a reward.  It is a silver sword, but with a secret tempering method that uses dwemer oil.
This tempering makes it as hard and sharp as ebony.
[I'M HAPPY] Talk with Kurdak if you want to learn more about this process.
[I'M PUZZLED] Let me see...
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] That is amazing! [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] The mages of the college have discovered another possible location for the next fragment!
[I'M PUZZLED] Dustman's Cairn... [I'M PUZZLED] I know where this place is.
[I'M PUZZLED] The letter says they were going to inform the Companions about the location...
[I'M SURPRISED] We must hurry! [I'M SURPRISED] We must go fast and be there as soon as possible.
I'll mark the location on your map.  I'll make the arrangements and gather some manpower for the excavations.
Meet me there in a few hours, we must be there before the Companions!
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] I can't believe it. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Ysgramor must be helping us from Sovngarde, somehow!
Good Brother!  That's the spirit!  Please, be discrete as possible.  No one should know he is our informant.
[I'M SAD] This is a long history. [I'M SAD] Let's I and Krev were invited to become beasts, and refused the 'gift'.
[I'M ANGRY] But we didn't want to stay quiet as well. [I'M ANGRY] Now, they are persecuting us.
[I'M PUZZLED] Enough talk about the past... [I'M PUZZLED] Soon we may talk more about that. [I'M PUZZLED] Now I need a favor.
Could you please talk to an informant we have on Winterhold?  He is called Nelacar.
Just ask him if he still has that silver ring to sell.  If he has any good news, he will find a way to tell you.
[I'M ANGRY] Their leaders. [I'M ANGRY] They say they are all equals. [I'M ANGRY] That was true in the past. [I'M ANGRY] Centuries ago.
[I'M ANGRY] Before they started to worship Hircine. [I'M ANGRY] Now, all the members of the circle share the same beast blood.
[THIS IS DISGUSTING] Yes. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] The Companions. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] The members of the circle. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] They are werewolves. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] All of them.
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Is that true? [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Brave! [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] We are one piece closer to finishing that puzzle!
[I'M HAPPY] As Krev may have told you, we the Silver Hand have been searching for the pieces of Wuuthrad for some centuries now.
It was broken into twelve pieces hundreds of years ago.  Right now, the Dogs in Whiterun have four pieces.
[I'M HAPPY] But, thanks to your help, we new have five fragments.
Yes.  I'm.  I believe you are the recruit, I'm right?
Welcome brother.  Let's recover the fragment inside this tomb.
The rest of the men are already inside excavating.  But beware.  The Companions may be coming as well.  Be ready to fight.
Lead the way!
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Great work soldier!
[I'M HAPPY] Take this armor and weapon as a reward for your efforts. [I'M HAPPY] I promote you to  a silver hand hunter.
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Congratulations. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Take this bear armor as a gift for your efforts.
[I'M PUZZLED] To be fair, I don't know yet... [I'M PUZZLED] We have been investigating for decades where it may be. [I'M PUZZLED] Some clues, but no confirmation...
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Great! [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] We now have seven fragments. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] The Companions four. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] There is only one lost piece...
Go ahead, I'll stand guard!
[I'M HAPPY] Lead the way!
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Great battle fellow brother! [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] We have just defeated one of the Circle members.

[THIS IS DISGUSTING][I'M REPULSED] That's the 'beast blood gift' they say. [THIS IS DISGUSTING][I'M REPULSED] I call it a daedric abomination... [THIS IS DISGUSTING][I'M REPULSED] Anyway, let's continue!
[I'M HAPPY] Let's call the brothers inside to help us.

[THIS IS DISGUSTING] Nice you asked. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] We hard that the companions were hired to kill a beast on Falkreath hold. [THIS IS DISGUSTING] Is our chance to take one more of them out of the guard.
[I'M ANGRY] Have no mercy with them. [I'M ANGRY] They would not have with you.
[I'M HAPPY] Good! [I'M HAPPY] We will be taking care of things here. [I'M HAPPY] We must clean up this mess, rebuild our defenses,  and make the proper funerals.
Fjol will tell us the next steps.
[I'M ANGRY][I'M FURIOUS] We were waiting to be attacked in retaliation to Farkas and Njada's death. [I'M ANGRY][I'M FURIOUS] But they attacked sooner than we expected.
[I'M HAPPY] Anyway, we had an important victory tonight. [I'M HAPPY] Krev must be proud of all of us now. [I'M HAPPY] Listen, Fjol needs to be notified of what happened.
[I'M PUZZLED] Since he was the second in charge, he must claim our leadership now.
[I'M SAD] Yes, we did it, we won the battle... [I'M SAD] But we lost our Leader, Krev. [I'M SAD] May his soul rest in peace in Sovngarde.
I'll be fine...  I have a healing potion...  You must hurry inside to help our brothers...
Companions...  th-they came sneaky, assault the fort.  They released those beasts into the cages...  Please brother...  avenge our shed blood....  ohhh
A long time ago...  Krev and I were Companions too.  We were almost like twin brothers, we were inseparable in the battles.
But one day...  We both were invited to ascend to the circle.
Fortunately, Krev noticed what the circle was about, and we fled before being forced to drink the cursed wolf's blood.
Since then, we have been fighting for the Silver Hand.  They didn't know but Krev's mother was murdered by a werewolf...
We have been hiring valiant warriors who hate werewolves and Daedra more than anything.
Now, the Silver Hand had grown stronger than ever.  But enough talk.  We must celebrate our victory.  Come on, let's celebrate!
Even though many of us have perished, this was a great victory for sure.
You know...  I must tell you some things...

[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] No... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Krev... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] My best friend... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] but... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] He must be better than us now, for sure!
[I'M HAPPY] He must be drinking the most delicious mead, with the most delightful woman in Sovngarde.

[I'M SURPRISED] By the nine! [I'M SURPRISED] Did we have many casualties?
[I'M HAPPY] Come on in. [I'M HAPPY] What brings you here?
Now you are officially a Stronghold Chief, and the second on the succession line of our group.  Congratulations!  Please, accept these gifts.
And as a reward for the bravery and efforts annihilating wolves, I offer you the leadership of the Gallows Rock fort.  Do you accept?
[I'M HAPPY] Listen brothers of Hunt! [I'M HAPPY] We just had a victory over the Companions. [I'M HAPPY] They assaulted Gallows Rock, but we were able to defeat them!
Three members of the circle have fallen, including Aela and Skjor.
Unfortunately our great leader Krev has perished in the battle.
He guided us for these years, and turned the Silver Hands stronger than ever.
Now we celebrate for the honor of his name, and his glorious entrance to Sovngarde!
Listen to brothers!  We have important news from Gallows Rock!
Good!  If you find anything there, please go look for me at Gallows Rock.  I'll be attending Krev's funeral.
I just received a letter from a Silver brother who was investigating clues of the last missing Wuuthrad's  fragment in Morrowind.
He discovered that an axe fragment was displayed centuries ago in the Mournhold Museum of Artifacts, but disappeared after the Argonian invasion.
But rumors emerged that a group of bandits have found this fragment.
They were last seen crossing the border near Riften, and are housed in Broken Helm Hollow.
Do you think you can handle this?
Ok.  Come talk with me when you are ready.  We need your help.
Excellent.  Meet the man outside Whiterun the next night, after Dusk.
[I'M HAPPY] Until then, use your time to select your best armor and weapon. [I'M HAPPY] And some healing potions. [I'M HAPPY] This fight is going to be tough.
We have been planning an assault on Jorrvaskr for a long time.  But now, since they lost the last battle, they are in a weak position.
We will enter Whiterun using a secret passage created by the companions, in the sewers.
[I'M HAPPY] We are going to attack by surprise, so we may take them out of the guard.
Once we are inside the city, it is just a step into Jorrvaskr.
After we went inside, we must aim at the Circle members.  Once all of them are struck down, the others should surrender.
If we hit them hard enough, we may force them to transform into beasts.
This will give another reason for the low ranks who don't know about the curse, to surrender.
Are you ready for the fight?
So the rumors were right!  Incredible!  The last missing piece.  For ages all these pieces were lost...  but now all pieces were found.
Eight with us...  four with the Companions.  And we will take it back!
So that's it!  Thanks to you all Wuuthrad pieces are once again together...
[I'M HAPPY] Follow me to the Skyforge  brother...
Good brother.  We've been waiting for you.  All the brothers are here.  Let's begin...
Thanks.  Come to me if you find it.
It must be hidden somewhere in the basement.
We will be cleaning the mess and preparing the bodies for the funerals.
I have one thing to request.  Three of the fragments in possession of the Companions are displayed on the wall, but one is missing...
We need to find it.  We need your help.
[I'M ANGRY] Brothers, put down your weapons!!
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] First, the cursed blood has gone, but we must keep it a secret. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] The people here in Whiterun don't need to know the rumors are indeed true.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Second: I cannot let you and your group rejoin the Companions.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] After all of this bloodshed, your presence would not be tolerated by any of Whiterun's clans.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] This would escalate to another endless war among our factions once again.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] You and our group should stay away from  Whiterun. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] At least not for a long time, until the wounds are healed...
[I'M ANGRY] Damn it... [I'M ANGRY] I was THIS close.
Hmm, I think you're right.  We've seen the secrets that can harm our faction.
Vignar, the Companions were meant to be brothers sworn by blood, not by leadership.  There should be no harbinger.  Not for a long time, at least.
Since Kodlak died, We need a new harbinger.  I think it should be you.
Yes sir...
Good.  Athis, come here.
I promise I will.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Do whatever you want, but do not get attention, and be quick as possible. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] And do not spill any more blood.
We will Vignar.  But I have a single request.  We need to use the Skyforge before leaving...
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] I hope that too Fjol.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] So that's it. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] You need to leave as soon as possible...
Actually, I did not want to come back either.  After so many years in the wilds, I get used to it.
The silence and the solitude of the northern wilds and winds are part of me now.
The vengeance has been made, the cursed blood is no more, and the pride of Ysgramor is restored.
It cost the blood of many generations, and the wounds are deep.  I hope someday they will be closed.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] So it happened... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Krev is dead too...
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] It has passed a long time since we were young.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] We all: I, Kodlack, Krev, and you were great friends...
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] We fought together many times... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] But Krev and you decided to follow the dissidents' path.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Kodlack and I decide to stay.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] He decided to join the Circle. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] He thought it was the right thing to do.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] You know... [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] Kodlak was searching for a cure. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] I think he was feeling this very day was coming...
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] It was only a matter of time.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] I will not perpetuate this bloodshed anymore. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] As the elder Companion member, I offer you a peace agreement.
[I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] No more cursed blood among the Companion, no more fight among us and the dissidents. [I'M SAD][I'M DEVASTATED] But I have two conditions.
Yes, we did it Vignar.  We cleaned the Circle from the Hircine Curse.  Now the Companions are free from Lycanthropy, and we vanged Krev's death.
Fjol...  as I see, I was not quick enough...  I knew it was coming to this one day.
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Brothers, put down your weapons!! [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] The Companions are not our enemies!
[I'M HAPPY] Brothers, put down your weapons!!
[I'M HAPPY] The Companions are not our enemies. [I'M HAPPY] They are our Brothers in blood. [I'M HAPPY] A long time ago we all were the same group!
[I'M HAPPY] But we, the Silver Hand, did not accept this Werewolf abomination you all are seeing now!
[I'M HAPPY] This is a curse  brought by the Witches Glenmoril into the heart of the Companions.
[I'M HAPPY] Since then, it was perpetrated by daedric rituals of blood devoted to Hircine.
[I'M HAPPY] We split into two separated groups, and we have been fighting for centuries.
[I'M HAPPY] But now, the Circle was defeated and Companions are free from the Daedric curse! [I'M HAPPY] It's time to rejoin again!
[I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Brothers and sisters. [I'M HAPPY][I'M ECSTATIC] Today is a great day that will be remembered through the ages.
[I'M HAPPY] Bards will sing songs calling our names, in memory  of what we did today.
On the very same day, we freed Skyrim's heart from the foul Hircine influence, and reassembled the ancient axe: Wuuthrad.
Today Ysgramor's honor over this land is finally restored!
[I'M HAPPY] Brothers, we managed to find the last fragment. [I'M HAPPY] Follow me to the Skyforge!
[I'M ANGRY] Here we are brothers, this will be the end for them.
[I'M ANGRY] I hope you're hungry!
[I'M ANGRY] Today, let's eat roast dog meat on Skyforge!
[I'M HAPPY] Now we have the witches' heads, so we must go to Ysgramor's Tomb, and burn them in the Harbinger Flame.
I understand.  If you change your mind, come talk to me at Driftshade.
Hillara and Sennar will responsible for managing the hunt's contracts.  Talk to them if you want to help.
Also, I would like to ask you to come back to Driftshade in some days.  I'm finishing another piece of research.
Good.  Hillara and Sennar are responsible for managing the contracts.
Talk to them to organize the wolf hunts.
Please, hold this axe and kill some beasts for me.
I think you should be the new Silver Hand leader.
I really think I'm better with my research than with leadership.
If wasn't for you, we wouldn't have made it.
Do you accept?
Yes.  But at least the companions are free from this ancient curse.  And we are not enemies anymore.  I hope our legates may rejoin again someday.
I have one more thing to ask.
Yes, Krev perished as well...
But I hope Kodlak and Krev are right now on Sovngarde putting all the anger and hate aside and sharing a sweet mead mug.
I have one more thing to ask.
